statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); project_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.project_dir'); user=$(whoami); host=$(hostname -s); if [ -d "$project_dir/.git" ]; then branch=$(cd "$project_dir" && git --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then git_info=$(printf "\033[35m(\033[36m%s\033[35m)\033[0m" "$branch"); else git_info=""; fi; else git_info=""; fi; if [ "$cwd" = "$project_dir" ]; then display_dir="~"; else display_dir=$(echo "$cwd" | sed "s|^$project_dir/|~/|" | sed "s|^$HOME|~|"); fi; printf "\033[32m%s@%s\033[0m:\033[34m%s\033[0m %s" "$user" "$host" "$display_dir" "$git_info"
